name: 72 Transformations
description: Erlang Shen transforms into an Mink or Turtle and charges forward.Mink: Damages all enemies, stopping on first god hit, increasing Attack Speed for 4s.Turtle: Knocks up all enemies in path and gains a health shield for 12s.
stats: Turtle Damage: 65/115/155/195/235 (+40% of your physical power)
Mink Damage: 70/130/190/250/310 (+85% of your physical power)
